title: The tenure of kings and magistrates proving that it is lawfull, and hath been held so through all ages, for any who have the power, to call to account a tyrant, or wicked king, and after due conviction, to depose and put the author, J.M.
author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.
notes: Attributed to John Milton. Cf. Halkett and Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
